programme.title: Bloodfist
programme.desc: Don Wilson plays retired kickboxer Jake Raye, who travels to Manila, where his brother is favored to win a kickboxing competition.

programme.title: Battle Creek Brawl
programme.desc: Jerry Kwan is a Korean man seeking fame and fortune in Chicago in the 1930s. But his serene life is turned upside-down when the merciless head of a mobster syndicate takes his brother's fianc√©e hostage.

programme.title: Bodyguards And Assassins
programme.desc: In 1905, revolutionist Sun Yat-Sen visits Hong Kong to discuss plans with Tongmenghui members to overthrow the Qing dynasty. But when they find out that assassins have been sent to kill him, they assemble a group of protectors to prevent any attacks.

programme.title: MST3K: Final Justice
programme.desc: Joe Don Baker tracks down an Italian mobster in Malta while Pearl tries to promote a looser humorous atmosphere in Castle Forrester.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Monster
programme.desc: After destroying all civilization on Earth, an alien attempts to wipe out the planet's last survivors.

programme.title: MST3K: The Atomic Brain
programme.desc: A mad scientist spawns a trio of horrible monsters while attempting a revolutionary brain transplant.

programme.title: MST3K: The Sword And The Dragon
programme.desc: A Russian hero plots an invasion against the Mongols in The Sword and the Dragon (1956).

programme.title: MST3K: Danger!! Death Ray
programme.desc: Secret Agent Bart Fargo chases the kidnappers of the inventor of a death ray.

programme.title: MST3K: The Creeping Terror
programme.desc: Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster.
